text:
I'm hoping there is someone who can provide an answer to the following.

I'm working with a client who is developing a marketplace app.  On install, they will likely create 3 custom objects to store reportable information. It is important that these custom objects are locked down and permissions can't be modified by any user of the account.  Permissions need to be fully controlled by the app/vendor.

What would be the best way to do that in HubSpot?
